name: business_delta
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool daysapi.
Tool description: An API that will count business days including holidays for the US.
API description: Given two dates. This endpoint will output the number of business
days between them.

Dates can be entered in any order. Please enter readable dates.
Doesn't have to be ISO or RFC formatted dates.

second_date.description: The second date in the range. Defaults to '2021-09-16'.

first_date.description: The first date in the range. Defaults to '2021-09-08'.
